item.title: Glossary Of Terms
item.author: somebody@somewere.tld (Not Provided)
item.description: Term Type Brief Description AccountingContext Context – undefined – Accounts Type Accounts are used to move money between Improving.App and an organization, or between suborganizations defined within an organization. ActivateTenant Type – undefined – Active State – undefined – Active Enumerator – undefined – Active State – undefined – Active Enumerator – undefined – Active State – undefined – Active Enumerator – undefined – ActiveTenantHandler Handler – undefined – ActiveVendorHandler Handler – undefined – AddLiveUpdate Type – undefined – AddLocationReservations Type – undefined – AddMembersToOrganization
